definition[0]: your name written in the way you usually write it, for example at the end of a letter, or on a cheque etc, to show that you have written it
example[0]: Her signature is totally illegible  (=cannot be read).
example[1]: The school collected 4,000 signatures for the petition.
example[2]: The Ukrainians put their signatures to the Lisbon Protocol.
example[3]: Someone’s forged my signature  (=made an illegal copy of my name to deceive people) on this letter.
example[4]: Each child must obtain the signature of his or her parents.
example[5]: We will send you a copy of the agreement for signature.
